alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Gratiot; Ionia; Montcalm (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 9:55AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Ionia, Gratiot, northern Clinton and southeastern Montcalm Counties through 1100 AM EDT... At 955 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles south of Stanton to near Ionia. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ionia... Alma... St. Johns... Ithaca... Stanton... St. Louis... Breckenridge... Carson City... Elsie... Eureka... Wheeler... Crystal... Sidney... Sumner... Ovid... Fowler... North Star... Lyons... Maple Rapids... Sheridan... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
